short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveal RSS and Atom feed URLs contained within web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click the icon or press Alt+R: if a web page includes links to RSS or Atom feeds within its metadata, this extension will display them in a Popup.

From the Popup you can
• Open a Feed in a new tab
• Copy a Feed's URL
• Create a QR Code for a Feed (eg. to scan into a phone)
• Subscribe to a Feed in an online Feed Reader*

Note:
If this extension can't find a website's RSS feeds, please let us know via the Support hub (link below). Customised code is required for websites which don't itemise their RSS feeds in one of the standard formats.

* Choose an online Feed Reader in the Options page:
chrome://extensions/?options=kmajpolcnelfjfilkkjkmhiiflhfglla
